Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the Indian flag was replaced with the Khalistani flag at the Red Fort.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the events by stating that the protesting farmers replaced the Indian flag with the Khalistani flag.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as the video and analysis show that the Indian flag remained untouched and intact throughout the duration of the video.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes a problematic assumption that the flag seen in the video is the Khalistani flag, when in fact it is the Nishan Sahib, a symbol of Sikh spirituality.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim ignores the alternative explanation that the flag seen in the video does not match the flags seen at pro-Khalistan events around the world.
